thread.title: Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3'
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3'

title: Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3'
text:
Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3' After getting a sequel and hit musical, Elle Woods has been dormant lately. Post to Facebook Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3' After getting a sequel and hit musical, Elle Woods has been dormant lately. Check out this story on wtsp.com: http://on.wtsp.com/1S6ewQq Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Reese Witherspoon is ready for 'Legally Blonde 3' USA Today, USAToday.com 11:01 a.m. EDT October 26, 2015 Actress Reese Witherspoon is shown in a scene from her new comedy film "Legally Blonde." The film about a blonde sorority queen who is dumped by her boyfriend and then decides to follow him to law school to get him back, opens in the United States July 13, 2001. (Photo: MGM) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
After getting a sequel and hit musical, Elle Woods has been dormant lately. 
Reese Witherspoon would like to change that , she revealed to Rachel Zoe on an episode of Fashionably Late with Rachel Zoe . 
"I think we're ready to see Elle and see what she's up to lately," she said, answering a fan's question about a possible third Legally Blonde entry. 
And amidst Hillary Clinton's possibly-historic presidential run, Witherspoon thinks now's the perfect time for a new film that follows Woods' own political ambitions. 
“I actually think it’s kind of great right now because we’re talking about women in politics and how important that is to get more women. And I think it’d be kind of a cool thing to have her be a Supreme Court Justice or somebody who runs for office, like president.” 
This news totally gives us endorphin's.
